cinnamon.engine.system

Class DefaultEventHub

  • java.lang.Object
    • cinnamon.engine.system.EventHub
      • cinnamon.engine.system.DefaultEventHub

  • public final class DefaultEventHub
extends EventHub

    This EventHub implementation is used when no user implementation is provided. All Events except InputEvents can be added from any thread through add(Event). This class assumes Window.Input as the only source of InputEvents and so all provided InputEvents must be added from the main thread. add(InputEvent) is not thread-safe.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Event event)
      Adds an Event to be handled.
      void add(InputEvent event)
      Adds an InputEvent to be handled.
      void broadcast()
      Removes the oldest queued(s) Event and gives it to the set EventDispatcher to be processed.

      • add

        public void add(InputEvent event)

        Adds an InputEvent to be handled.

        This method should not be called from any thread other than main without external synchronization.

        Parameters:
        event - KeyEvent or MouseEvent.
